explains: adv. 根本地，基础地；（用来加强语气）从根本上说

sentences.en: They remained fundamentally opposed to the plan.
sentences.cn: 他们依然从根本上反对这项计划。

sentences.en: By the 1960s the situation had changed fundamentally.
sentences.cn: 到20世纪60年代形势已发生了根本的变化。

sentences.en: Environmentalists say the treaty is fundamentally flawed.
sentences.cn: 环境保护主义者称那个条约从根本上是有缺陷的。
